title: Chilwell
author: Chilwell
content: Original Topic: [Voting 2022] Bitcointalk Community Awards 🏆Author: icopressQuote from: ➥ Thread in [Eng] • [Rom] • [Ger] • [Por] • [Ita] ➥ Last year's [Results]   ➥ Bitcointalk Quiz  [Live]  ➥ Ledger Nano X [Free Raffle] 🎁Bitcointalk Community Awards na great opportuniti 4 us wey we go express appreciation go to special people who dey do deir best 4 deir communiti, 4 all di good deeds, and 4 di impact wey dey get 4 di forum. Even though 2022 na very challenging year 4 everyone, e no fit stop us 4 takin stock by votin 4 significant events or people wey you think deserve an award, (especially since dis year we go have 30 prizes!). 🏆       Wat prizes await di winners?Your dey hear 4rm us repeatedly dat public recognition is di most prestigious award, e really is. However, our sponsor 🦊 Betnomi dey make sure dat di winners really felt dey mattered. In addition, everyone's favorite [C]ryptioS dey also preparing a surprise (dis go be announced later in dis thread). Pls note dat Bitcointalk Awards 2022 no be official event and dey run am under di auspices of  di communiti.🥈 2rd place🥇 1st place🥉 3rd placePrize 4 6 mBTCCustom Ledger & 12 mBTC ➥ NotePrize of 3 mBTC                                                                                                                                                                              How e dey works?4rm di moment of publication, and  60 days, public votin go dey open, in wch any active user go take part. Any user get right to campaign for or against oda candidates 4 separate thread specially created 4 dis. Who go be among top three winners in each respective category depens only on your activity. 4 di voting system to work, any nominated candidate must get di support  4 at least three users.Up to 3 users go fit vote 4 each category ➥ Note.You go fit edit your application until di thread dey lock ➥ Note.You go get 50 earn merits 2 vote ➥ Note.Dey no fit send Merit give person wey choose dem & Votes wey dey cast for absent users go no count ➥ Note.Custom titleDescription 4 di Nomination  AbsoluteHero of GoodDi award is given 2 di informal leada, (di presence of cult dey encourage). 🎭Dis outstandin man don devote many years 2 serve di communiti and has left an indelible legacy by doin communiti service without regard 4 personal gain.Golden FeatherDi award dey presented 2 di participant whose name symbolizes trust and wisdom.Dere have always been users on di forum who stand out 4rm di crowd in writin style and objectivity, dose whose posts are always pleasant 2 read, and discussions wit dem bring satisfaction.Bitcointalk NinjaDey dey give award 4 exceptional contribution 4 development of Bitcointalk!A person wey em activities dey extremely useful 4 di Bitcointalk communiti, or someone without whom u cannot imagine a forum. 4 dis category, di truly creative people are judge, and now na di time to determine di best!Bitcoin GeekDey dey give award 4 di participant wey u felt was di most helpful in di Bitcoin-related areas.Tell us wch of your acquaintances is passionate about Bitcoin 2 di extreme, who can easily explain 2 u such nuances dat you did not even no about or who simply chose a ASIC 4 your grandma.Event 4 di YearWat event get di biggest impact on you?Dis nomination is a tribute to di most notable events in di crypto community or di most significant 4 you personally. Dis is di third annual award, you go only nominate and vote 4 all significant events for 2022.Fail of the YearDi most promisin event, wch brought  lot of disappointment 2 di community. E dey much more pleasant 2 remember pleasant events, but nevertheless, e go be useful 4 us 2 draw conclusions in orda 2 avoid disappointments for di future. Wat was di most difficult thin 4 you 2 come 2 terms wit?Discovery4 di YearPerhaps one of di most unexpected but at disame time iconic categories, wch show dat di forum is alive.Di award dey presented not only 2 novice Bitcoiners, but also 2 oda users who have been actively participatin in di life of did forum over di past year ... heck, you go even nominate your best Bitcointalk friend!SpamBustaDey dey give award 4 di volunteer user 4 deir invaluable contribution 2 maintainin orda on di forum.We tend 2 think dat dis award is best suited 2 di most important figure among moderators & reporters or who contributes in every possible way 2 di suppression 4 fake activity in di threads.  ScamBusta Dey dey give award 4 an outstandin volunteer workin exclusively 4 di benefit of di community.He adheres 2 a fairly strong moral codex, is a role model and consistently demonstrates an inexhaustible enthusiasm 4 identifyin abusers on Bitcointalk, (here [1] [2] you go fit no  such users personally).  Craft MastaDey dey give award 4 dose who sincerely love deir craft, whether e is  professional activity or a hobby.We tend to think dat dis award is best suited 2 di most significant figure among collectors, managers, escrows, designers or users who are so passionate about sports and p2p dat dey motivate oda to bets solely in BTC.  AntiheroHe neva wanted 2 bi a villain, but he don accept di rules 4 di game in wch he “plays black”.Even "evil" get its own principles, so such a person is capable of anything, even if e does not benefit him. 😈  Miss BitcointalkAlthough girls now dey minoriti 4 Bitcointalk, 5 to 1, dey are still wonderful, interestin and important to us. I understand dat choosin three winners 4rm among all our beautiful girls is problematic, but still we go try.Who you think say deserves especially go be Miss Bitcointalk?__________________________________Quote from: Mr.X ➥ I would like to express special gratitude: Cyrus, Sorsis, GazetaBitcoin4 di most part, dis thread na 4 votin, 2 facilitate di countin of votes / di thread 4 discussion and agitation is here.
